SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
COMMERCE MARKETPLACE
Add Buttons to Sync Commerce Marketplace and Salesforce Object

Add custom buttons to sync your Salesforce Commerce store with the Commerce Marketplace app.

Before adding custom buttons for Marketplace Specification, enable the List View Button Layout page.
From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Objects and Fields, and then select Object Manager.
Click Marketplace Specification.
Click Details.
In the Details page, click Edit.
Under Search Status, enable Allow Search.
Save your changes.
Add custom buttons.
From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Objects and Fields, and then select Object Manager.
Click Marketplace Specification.
On the left, click List View Button Layout.
From the List View action dropdown, click Edit.
Under Custom Buttons, select Schedule Synch and Sync All Specs.
To add the buttons, click the right arrow.
Save your changes.
Repeat these steps and add the "Sync All" button to the following objects:
Marketplace Category
Marketplace Price Book
Marketplace Product
Add a custom button to the Marketplace Product Object Record page.
The Marketplace Product object has an extra custom button in the Lightning record page that need to be added manually.
From the Object Manager, click Marketplace Product.
Click Lightning Record Pages, and then click Product Record Page.
Near Lightning Page Detail, click Clone.
In the Lightning App Builder, in the Highlights Panel, click Add Action.
Search for Create Storefront Product.
Click Add Filter.
For Filter Type, select Advanced.
Under Field, click Select, and select Record, Record Type, and Record Type Name, and click Done.
For Operator, select Equal, and for Value, enter Marketplace
Click Done, click Done again, and save your changes.
In the Lightning App Builder page, click Save.
In the Page Saved window, click Activate.
In the Activation window, click App Default and click Assign as App Default.
Select Commerce Marketplace.
Click Next, click Next again, and save your changes.

Let us know so we can improve!

No
title: Configuring Custom Buttons for Salesforce Commerce Marketplace
